text: At least three ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name HMS Sarpedon. They are named after Sarpedon, a Greek hero and son of Zeus. * was an 18-gun brig- sloop launched in 1809 and foundered in 1813. * HMS Sarpedon (1913) was a destroyer that was renamed HMS Laertes within three months of launching in 1913. * was a destroyer launched in 1916 and sold in 1926. ==See also== * Sarpedon (disambiguation) ==References== Category:Royal Navy ship names
title: HMS Sarpedon
